ml.alternet.scan

Class TrackableScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.scan.Scanner
      • ml.alternet.scan.TrackableScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rewindable, Trackable

    public class TrackableScanner
extends Scanner
implements Trackable
    A scanner that tracks the current line, column, and offset.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    Scanner.asTrackable()

      Create a new trackable scanner.
      TrackableScanner(Scanner scanner, long line, long column, long offset)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackableScanner

        public TrackableScanner(Scanner scanner)
                 throws IOException
        Create a new trackable scanner. The internal state of this trackable scanner is the one which is wrapped.
        Parameters:
        scanner - The scanner to wrap.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an I/O error occur.

      • TrackableScanner

        public TrackableScanner(Scanner scanner,
                        long line,
                        long column,
                        long offset)
                 throws IOException
        Create a new scanner with an initial position.
        Parameters:
        scanner - The scanner to wrap.
        line - The initial line number.
        column - The initial column number.
        offset - The initial offset number.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an I/O error occur.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
            throws IllegalStateException
        Cancel the current mark. The previous column and line are restored.
        Specified by:
        cancel in interface Rewindable
        Specified by:
        cancel in class Scanner
        Throws:
